entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers near noon. Snow level rising to 2000 metres this afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
